detail_desc: Slim-fit, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with fake front pockets and real back pockets. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit.
Cropped top in soft, ribbed jersey with a V-neck, straight cut at the back and narrow shoulder straps.
Shorts in woven fabric. High waist with belt loops where the front ones can be unfastened, a zip fly and a concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets and wide legs.
Calf-length skirt in a viscose crêpe weave. High waist with elastication at the back, and buttons and a high slit at the front. Unlined.
Cap in cotton twill with an embroidered motif on the front, a glittery peak and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Rain jacket in windproof, waterproof functional fabric with closed seams. Detachable hood with elasticated sides, a zip down the front and an elasticated hem. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Sleeveless dresses in patterned organic cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Sleeveless tops in soft cotton jersey with a gathered, elasticated frill around the neckline and armholes.
Dress in an airy viscose and Tencel™ lyocell blend with shaped cups, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, decorative seams front and back and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Straight-cut coat in woven fabric with a high collar and buttons down the front. Diagonal, welt side pockets, two inner pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Set with a hooded jacket and joggers in sweatshirt fabric and a jersey T-shirt, all with print motifs. Hooded jacket with a zip down the front. Joggers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
A-line dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a detachable belt in braided imitation suede. Long raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Pyjamas with a T-shirt top and bottoms in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a round neckline and print motif on the front. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and tapered legs.
Backpack in grained imitation leather with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a handle and drawstring at the top. Imitation suede flap with a magnetic fastener. Unlined. Size 15x28x35 cm.

Cropped, fitted top in soft jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a sweetheart neckline. Vertical seams with concealed elastication to create a draped effect and a concealed silicone trim top and bottom for best fit. Lined.
Straight-style jumper in a soft jacquard knit with a ribbed polo neck, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Slightly wider fit.
Trousers in satin with a detachable tie belt, a high waist, pleats and the top and tapered legs. Side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Long-sleeved, soft cotton jersey tops in various designs.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Patterned dress in soft woven fabric with a slight sheen and 3/4-length sleeves. Tie belt at the waist and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lined.
Leggings in stretch, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Double-layered jersey hats. One patterned and one in a solid colour.
Body in soft jersey with a low-cut back, short sleeves and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Tailored trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, and side and back pockets. Straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.
Shirt in a viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets, long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a detachable belt in braided imitation suede.
Classic T-shirt in soft, gently draping jersey made from a cotton and silk blend. Straight cut with short sleeves.

Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with pleats at the top for added width. High waist with elasticated smocking at the back, decorative buttons down the front and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined. The polyester content of the skirt is partly recycled.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in organic cotton with a collar, button placket and press-studs at the crotch.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Lined bikini top with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Balaclava in soft, textured-knit organic cotton with sewn-on ears at the top. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbed trims around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Short, V-neck dress in a softly draping viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Padded nylon jacket with a detachable, lined hood and lined sleeves in sweatshirt fabric. Stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Shorts in washed cotton denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Skinny-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Two-button jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket with a lining that can be used as a decorative handkerchief, flap front pockets and two inner pockets, one with a button. One button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Imitation suede desert boots with lacing at the front and a welt seam around the soles. Twill linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Two pairs of metal hoop earrings in different sizes. Diameter approx. 1 cm and 2 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with appliqués on the front, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and gathers in the sides for best fit.

Pyjamas with a top and shorts in soft viscose jersey. Top with a slightly wider neckline and short, lace-trimmed raglan sleeves. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access. Short shorts with a low, wrapover waist with covered elastication, and lace-trimmed hems.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
5-pocket, skinny-fit jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems.
Sleeveless dress in printed jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Vest tops in soft, ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a gentle V-neck, lace trim at the top and narrow shoulder straps with lace.

Knee-length, V-neck nursing dress in soft jersey with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and narrow, elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative tie. Practical inner top for easier nursing access. Unlined.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot, decorative bow at the front, grosgrain trim around the top edge and a loop at the back. Satin linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Top in a cotton weave with short cap sleeves and a gathered, elasticated neckline.
3/4-length leggings in soft stretch denim with an elasticated waist, print motif on the front, fake front pockets and short slits at the hems.
Wide, satin-covered Alice band.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with covered elastication at the waist and a print motif on the knees. Brushed inside.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a round neckline, an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length, flounced sleeves. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a ribbed polo neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted polo-neck top in a soft, fine rib-knit viscose blend with long sleeves and an open section at the top.
Viscose jersey top with a deep neckline at the front and short cap sleeves.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with short sleeves, short legs and press-stud fastenings.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless dress in a jacquard weave containing glittery threads with a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and a very wide skirt with a tulle underskirt. Lined.

Suit trousers in an airy linen and cotton weave with elastication at the back of the waist and a zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Ballet pumps with scalloped edges. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Long-sleeved dress in a short, fitted style.
Espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the soles and elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Body in crêpe jersey with a U-shaped decoration at the top, a detachable strap at the back of the neck, concealed silicone trim at the top and press-studs at the crotch.
5-pocket jeans in superstretch washed denim with a regular waist and super-skinny legs.
Longer hooded top in soft fleece with appliqués and embroidery. Long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft and fluffy inside.
Short three-strand necklace in metal and imitation suede. Adjustable length, 29-37 cm.
Pyjamas in soft viscose. Jersey top and woven shorts with an elasticated waist and slits at the hems.
Vest top in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend.
Shorter top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft modal and cotton blend with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip at the top and long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Short top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves and a seam at the hem with a decorative knot detail at the front.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Shorts in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets, and slim legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with an appliqué.
